name: La Maupin to the Rescue!
description:
Rescue your beloved girlfriend from the evil convent. Fight drunks, sneak around, fool people, set things on fire!

You can do this and more on La Maupin to the Rescue! a VN made by @Rumpelcita and crysanthema for Yuri Jam 2017. Music by Dure Mere and Tres Tristes Tangos.

It's based on the life of Julie d’Aubigny a.k.a La Maupin.
